revised_title: The Devonian Fish Palaeospondylus gunni Traquair: Anatomy and Affinities
tldr: The author examines the anatomy of the Devonian fish Palaeospondylus gunni and reinterprets its skull structure. They establish a new order, Palaeospondyloidea, and discuss its affinities. The study provides insights into the classification and evolution of ancient fish during the Devonian period.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Paleobiology
